Special guests include:

Former Alaska governor Sarah Palin

Former Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich

Alabama Senator Jeff Sessions

Andrew McCarthy, former Assistant U.S. Attorney and National Review editor

Erik Prince, former Navy SEAL and CEO of Blackwater

FBI Special Agent Kim Jensen

Former DHS Agent Philip Haney

Radical Islam expert Pamela Geller

Frank Gaffney, President of the Center for Security Policy

GOP strategist Roger Stone

Sarah Longwell of Log Cabin Republicans

Baseball legend Curt Schilling

Breitbart Tech Editor Milo Yiannopoulos

Breitbart Editor in Chief Alex Marlow

Breitbart News Sunday is broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 7PM to 10PM Eastern.

On a special edition of Breitbart News Sunday, SiriusXM host and Breitbart News Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will discuss the massacre at an Orlando gay nightclub by a gunman who pledged his allegiance to the Islamic State.
Bannon will be joined by a panel of special guests who will analyze all aspects of the attack from the national security to the political ramifications.
Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
